attributes.action: faster, more frequent service to mill hill east tube station
attributes.additional_details: The northern line extends,on the High Barnet branch, to Mill Hill East. This may not be the most popular station, but it is a vital part of its community and there are often excessive amounts of trains not going to Mill Hill East when there are many communters waiting! This causes frequent delays for these commuters and are often late to their destination. SIGN THIS PETITION TO SOLVE THIS PROBLEM!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor and Greater London Assembly.
